title: Update Media Buy Async Response - Input Required
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for update_media_buy when status is 'input-required'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that additional input or fixes are required before the update can proceed (e.g., budget increase exceeds threshold, invalid targeting).

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy requiring input or fixes. Required for identifying which update operation needs attention.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining what input or fixes are needed

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

examples.description: Input required for budget increase that exceeds maximum

errors.message: Budget increase from $30,000 to $80,000 exceeds the maximum allowed increase of $50,000. Please reduce the budget increase to $50,000 or less.
errors.suggestion: Reduce budget increase to $50,000 or less to proceed
